Params[3]: You have traveled for a while without running into any surprises while having also gathered quite a bit of data.

Params[2]: Let's sort out all the key information first.

Params[3]: Alright, I've laid out all the known information on the Ascendants and Huaxu. I can use this database to screen for useful intel.
It looks like a daunting task. Let's do it!
You reconvene after investigating for quite some time.
I haven't found anything that matches the keywords.
...All I see is the Corrupted going about their boring routine.
I didn't find any useful clues matching the keywords, but I came across a letter... A farewell letter, rather.
Well, a torn farewell letter. It's only the first half of the page. I was able to find it because it contains the word "Huaxu".

Correct. It says: "I found a way to fight the Punishing Virus. I wanted to use it to create the legendary Huaxu Utopia. But it has cost all of my possessions, and it appears that I will die before its completion..."
If you are reading this letter, please look for it at the location below...
A method to fight the Punishing Virus?
It's probably either a ruse or just nonsense.
You're right. We can't confirm it without the last part. But it shouldn't go ignored.

Params[2]: Let's look for the last part of the letter.

Params[3]: Alright. We'll keep an eye out. Let's keep going, Commandant.
The Corrupted up ahead are all on the left. The path on the right seems to be safer.
